name: books24x7 readable
description:
books24x7 readable
Please install below script in GreaseMonkey/TamperMonkey for the Font change.
http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/393897

If you don't need to customize the style youself, please install this extension, it don't depend on other extensions like stylish or tampermonkey, very simple.
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/restyle-books24x7/offifnmljgpgomdanfchlbgheghhlkil
